Text: EXPRESS MAIL SUSPENSION IN DCTO JGS Faculty This notice has just been received from the Houston Post Office Due to current operating conditions and government security measures Express Mail destined for federal government agencies in Washington DC ZIP Codes through are experiencing significant delays Therefore effective immediately Express Mail service to Washington DC ZIP Codes through is temporarily suspended Until the suspension is lifted mailers should use FirstClass Mail for mail destined for these ZIP Codes Ill advise you when the suspension is lifted Pat Kambhu Pat Kambhu Manager Delivery Services MS Rice University PO Box Houston TX Phone Fax Board Member Southwest Assoc of College and University Mail Services Board Member Houston Postal Customer Council
